OrgName: Weight Watchers International, Inc. and WeightWatchers.com, Inc.
activities: Personal information, including but not limited to individually identifiable information about consumers and employees, is used in support of commercial operations and human resources administration.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: TRUSTe; EU Data Protection Authorities (for EU human resources data); Federal Data Protection and Information Commission (for Swiss human resources data)
